JUSTICE ASHOK MENON THURSDAY, THE 09TH DAY OF JANUARY 2020 / 19TH POUSHA, 1941 Cr1.MC.No.6457 OF 2019(F) TO DIRECT THE 2ND ADDITIONAL ASSISTANT SESSIONS JUDGE, ERNAKULAM TO DEFER THE TRIAL OF S.C.NO.849/2018 FOR SUCH PERIOD OF TIME AS MAY BE DIRECTED BY THIS HONOURABLE COURT PETITIONERS/ACCUSED NO. 1 TO 5: 1 SYAM MOHAN, AGED 24 YEARS, S/O.MOHAN, KORPULLITHARA HOUSE, PUTHUVYPU VILLAGE, VYPEEN, KOCHI TALUK, ERNAKULAM - 682 508. 2 ARUN, AGED 26 YEARS, S/O.ABBAS, PANDARAPARAMBIL HOUSE, NEAR ATHIRA BUS STOP, HOUSE, PUTHUVYPU VILLAGE, VYPEEN, KOCHI TALUK, ERNAKULAM - 682 508. 3 ABIJITH, AGED 25 YEARS, S/O.ABBAS, PANDARAPARAMBIL HOUSE, NEAR ATHIRA BUS STOP, HOUSE, PUTHUVYPU VILLAGE, VYPEEN, KOCHI TALUK, ERNAKULAM - 682 508. 4 TONY, AGED 25 YEARS, S/O.JOHNY, MUKKATH HOUSE, PUTHUVYPEKARA, PUTHUVYPU VILLAGE, VYPEEN, KOCHI TALUK, ERNAKULAM - 682 508. 5 SUJI @ SUJITH, AGED 29 YEARS, S/O.VASU, KANJIRAKAD HOUSE, AARAT ROAD, NEAR SEASHORE, NJARAKKAL VILLAGE, a Pr rab: Sits pe a Crl.MC.No.6457 OF 2019(F) 2020/KER/LO37 2 VYPEEN, KOCHI TALUK, ERNAKULAM - 682 508. BY ADV. SRI.P.B.AJOY RESPONDENTS /STATE: STATE OF KERALA, REPRESENTED BY THE SHO(STATION HOUSE OFFICER), NJARAKKAL POLICE STATION, ERNAKULAM DISTRICT, THROUGH THE PUBLIC PROSECUTOR, HIGH COURT OF KERALA, ERNAKULAM - 682 031. OTHER PRESENT: SRI.C.S.HRITHWIK SR. PUBLIC PROSECUTOR THIS CRIMINAL MISC. CASE HAVING COME UP FOR ADMISSION ON 09.01.2020, THE COURT ON THE SAME DAY PASSED THE FOLLOWING: Crl.MC.No.6457 OF 2019 (F) 2020/KER/TO37 3 ORDER Dated this the 9th day of January, 2020 The petitioners are accused in S.C. No. 849/2018 pending on the files of the 2 Additional Assistant Sessions Court, Ernakulam. It is submitted that there is a counter case which was pending before the Judicial First Class Magistrate Court, Njarakkal as C.C. No.947/2018. Being a case and counter case, steps were taken for both the cases being tried by the same court, and it is submitted by the learned counsel for the petitioners that the case pending before the Judicial First Class Magistrate Court, Njarakkal has now been committed to the Sessions Court and the allotment of the said case to the 2 Additional Assistant Sessions Court is awaited. 2. The prayer in this petition is only to defer the trial of S.C. No.849/2018 for such period as may be directed by this court. There is an interim stay already granted by this court. In view of the fact that the counter case has also been Ee, Stet] Crl.MC.No.6457 OF 2019(F) 2020/KER/LO37 4 transferred to the Sessions division, both the cases can be tried together by the same court. With these observations, the petition is disposed.
